languages.text:
Creates holo-projections that disrupt the targeting systems of enemy ships.
Each attack made by an enemy has an equal chance of targeting either the real ship or one of its projections. Each time a projection is hit, the holo-field loses one charge.
languages.original_text:
Создает голографические проекции, отвлекающие противника и сбивающие прицел.
Каждая атака врага имеет равный шанс попасть в настоящий корабль или его проекции. Каждый раз, когда попадание приходится на проекцию, голополе теряет один заряд.

traits.locale_text:
Creates holo-projections that disrupt the targeting systems of enemy ships.
Each attack made by an enemy has an equal chance of targeting either the real ship or one of its projections. Each time a projection is hit, the holo-field loses one charge.

Creates holo-projections that disrupt the targeting systems of enemy ships.
Each attack made by an enemy has an equal chance of targeting either the real ship or one of its projections. Each time a projection is hit, the holo-field loses one charge.

Creates holo-projections that disrupt the targeting systems of enemy ships.
Each attack made by an enemy has an equal chance of targeting either the real ship or one of its projections. Each time a projection is hit, the holo-field loses one charge.

Creates holo-projections that disrupt the targeting systems of enemy ships.
Each attack made by an enemy has an equal chance of targeting either the real ship or one of its projections. Each time a projection is hit, the holo-field loses one charge.

languages.text:
Создает голографические проекции, отвлекающие противника и сбивающие прицел.
Каждая атака врага имеет равный шанс попасть в настоящий корабль или его проекции. Каждый раз, когда попадание приходится на проекцию, голополе теряет один заряд.

Erzeugt Holo-Projektionen, die die Zielsysteme gegnerischer Schiffe stören.
Bei jedem Angriff eines Gegners besteht die gleiche Chance, das echte Schiff oder eine der Projektionen zu treffen. Wird eine Projektion getroffen, verliert das Holofeld eine Ladung.
languages.original_text:
Creates holo-projections that disrupt the targeting systems of enemy ships.
Each attack made by an enemy has an equal chance of targeting either the real ship or one of its projections. Each time a projection is hit, the holo-field loses one charge.

traits.locale_text:
Erzeugt Holo-Projektionen, die die Zielsysteme gegnerischer Schiffe stören.
Bei jedem Angriff eines Gegners besteht die gleiche Chance, entweder das echte Schiff oder eine der Projektionen zu treffen. Jedes Mal, wenn eine Projektion {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffen{/g} wird, verliert das Holofeld eine Ladung.

languages.text:
Crée des holoprojections qui perturbent les systèmes de ciblage des vaisseaux ennemis.
Chaque attaque ennemie a les mêmes chances de viser le vaisseau réel ou l'une de ses projections. Chaque fois qu'une projection est touchée, l'holo-champ perd une charge.
languages.original_text:
Creates holo-projections that disrupt the targeting systems of enemy ships.
Each attack made by an enemy has an equal chance of targeting either the real ship or one of its projections. Each time a projection is hit, the holo-field loses one charge.

traits.locale_text:
Crée des holoprojections qui perturbent les systèmes de ciblage des vaisseaux ennemis.
Chaque attaque ennemie a les mêmes chances de viser le vaisseau réel ou l'une de ses projections. Chaque fois qu'une projection est {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchée{/g}, l'holo-champ perd une charge.

languages.text:
制造光球投影，干扰敌舰瞄准系统。
敌人的每次攻击，都有同等几率击中真正的战舰，或是其中一个投影。每当投影被击中时，全息投影都会失去1层效果。
languages.original_text:
Creates holo-projections that disrupt the targeting systems of enemy ships.
Each attack made by an enemy has an equal chance of targeting either the real ship or one of its projections. Each time a projection is hit, the holo-field loses one charge.

traits.locale_text:
制造光球投影，干扰敌舰瞄准系统。
敌人的每次攻击，都有同等几率击中真正的战舰，或是其中一个投影。每当投影被{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}击中{/g}时，全息投影都会失去1层效果。

languages.text:
Crea holoproyecciones que interfieren en los sistemas de puntería de las naves enemigas.
Cada ataque lanzado por un enemigo tiene la misma probabilidad de alcanzar a la nave real o a cada una de las proyecciones. Cada vez que una proyección sufre un impacto, el campo holográfico pierde una carga.
languages.original_text:
Creates holo-projections that disrupt the targeting systems of enemy ships.
Each attack made by an enemy has an equal chance of targeting either the real ship or one of its projections. Each time a projection is hit, the holo-field loses one charge.

traits.locale_text:
Crea holoproyecciones que interfieren en los sistemas de puntería de las naves enemigas.
Cada ataque lanzado por un enemigo tiene la misma probabilidad de alcanzar a la nave real o a cada una de las proyecciones. Cada vez que una proyección sufre un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g}, el campo holográfico pierde una carga.

languages.text:
敵艦の照準システムを妨害するホログラムを投影する。
敵の攻撃はそれぞれが、等確率で本物の戦艦かホログラムのどちらかをターゲットにする。ホログラムが被弾する度に、ホロフィールドはチャージを1つ失う。
languages.original_text:
Creates holo-projections that disrupt the targeting systems of enemy ships.
Each attack made by an enemy has an equal chance of targeting either the real ship or one of its projections. Each time a projection is hit, the holo-field loses one charge.

traits.locale_text:
敵艦の照準システムを妨害するホログラムを投影する。
敵の攻撃はそれぞれが、等確率で本物の戦艦かホログラムのどちらかをターゲットにする。ホログラムが被弾する度に、ホロフィールドはチャージを1つ失う。

languages.text:
Düşman gemilerinin hedefleme sistemlerini bozan holografik projeksiyonlar oluşturur.
Düşmanın yaptığı her saldırının ya gerçek gemiyi ya da projeksiyonlarından birini eşit oranda hedefleme olasılığı bulunur. Her projeksiyon vuruluşunda holo-alan, bir şarjını kaybeder.
languages.original_text:
Creates holo-projections that disrupt the targeting systems of enemy ships.
Each attack made by an enemy has an equal chance of targeting either the real ship or one of its projections. Each time a projection is hit, the holo-field loses one charge.
